title: CCTV Camera
desc1: This is a web-based project and online platform for online shopping and Our main target is to sell cctv camera .
desc2: I have created two dashboards. One is for admin, other is for users.
desc3: An admin can maintain the whole process of management. An admin can add, delete,and update products, manage all orders and approve or cancel a userâ€™s orders, and make a new admin from the user.
desc4: I have implemented a dashboard here for the User. Customers can visit the websitefrequently. After completing login implementation, He/she can press order, cancel his order, and review our services and website.
tech: React.js, React Router, React Bootstrap, React Hook Form, Axios, React Rating, JWT Token, Font Awesome, Node.js, Express.js,MongoDB, Heroku, Firebase Authentication

title: Bike House
desc1: Customer can buy any bicycle as your like and can order frequently and also can pay with any credit or debit card and BKhas or Nogod.
desc2: we take return-free any selling cycle if it is wrong
desc3: An Admin can add and delete products and also manage all orders
desc4: Any order will confirm when an admin approves this order. An admin can also create a new admin
tech: React.js, React Router, React Bootstrap, React Hook Form, Node.js, Express.js,MongoDB, Heroku, Firebase Authentication

title: Travel
desc1: It is a Mern Stack project.Travel is a hotel booking website based on the place that you want to visit
desc2: Users can select their favorite country where they will spend their vacation and can also book after completing login implementation
desc3: No admin panel (any user will act like an admin) .So He/she can handle and delete not only any order but also manage all orders
desc4: You can add a service if you have services relevant to the website
tech: React.js, React Router, React Bootstrap, React Hook Form, Node.js, Express.js,MongoDB, Heroku, Firebase Authentication

title: Eye Care Center
desc1: This is a simple eye care related website
desc2: his functional base full responsive site is based on react and firebase where people can visit easily and can know information about eye disease.
desc3: Users can see more details about our service after login.
